description: Did you know that the European AI & Cloud Summit https://lnkd.in/dVrz7DSs (delivered in partnership with Microsoft 🏆) is the leading and the largest Azure, Security, AI and Microsoft Cloud conference in Europe? 💡 Okay, you did. Did you know that I am one of the speakers at this unparalleled awesome event? 🎤🔥 Oh, you knew that too. Then join me, and 3000 other attendees, in Düsseldorf, Germany 🇩🇪, on May 26-28, for three days of pure Azure, Security, and Artificial Intelligence learning ⚡, networking 🤝, partying 🎉, and fun 😃. I promise you it will be awesome. 🚀 If you use the voucher code from this picture or ckick here: https://lnkd.in/dVrz7DSs, you will also get a 15% discount on all ticket types. 🎟️💰 See you in Düsseldorf 🇩🇪, and don't forget that #communityrocks! 🤘💙Registrations and more info at https://lnkd.in/dVrz7DSs. …more
